attributes.action: Publicy acknowledge the significance of the foreign policy aspects of the Lisbon Treaty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government is underestimating, and certainly downplaying in public, the significance of the creation of these foreign policy aspects. This is unlikely to be beneficial to the UK's position in the EU. We petition that the Government should publicly acknowledge the significance of the foreign policy aspects of the Lisbon Treaty in line with the recommendations of the select committee.

rejection.details: We do not accept petitions that simply call upon the Prime Minister to publicly agree with a petition creator's opinion.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
